physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Yellowish papules on the neck; Doppler ultrasound examination of peripheral arteries and aorta revealed no abnormalities.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Skin changes developed in the axillary, inguinal, popliteal, and antecubital folds over the last 2 years; mild laxity of affected sites.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Yellowish papules on the side of the neck; Doppler ultrasound examination showed no abnormalities.
Skin biopsy showed characteristic dermal elastic tissue changes of PXE.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Skin changes progressed after second transplantation in 2004 but have been stable since 2006.
